metadata.title: CVE-2017-6888 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An error in the "read_metadata_vorbiscomment_()" function(src/libFLAC/stream_decoder.c) in FLAC version 1.3.2 can be exploited tocause a memory leak via a specially crafted FLAC file.

criterions.comment: oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
flac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
praat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
